link.title: Detroit Community Schools | Education is Power

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom current-menu-item current_page_item menu-item-home menu-item-234

li.a: Update from the Superintendent Nancy Berkompas
Helping children cope with stress during COVID-19 Outbreak

div.p: EDUCATION IS POWER

div.h4: We care about the whole student.
div.p: We know that everything from nutrition, to housing, to extracurricular activities can affect a student’s education.
At DCS, we provide programs and services that address each student’s unique goals and needs.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_0 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left

div.p: We provide completely free tutoring for all students who need it.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_1 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left

div.p: Parents are busy; we totally get it! We support our K-8 families with a free aftercare program.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_2 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left

div.p: From visiting colleges across the country, to traveling to places like Chicago and Cedar Point, our students love exploring with DCS.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_3 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left

div.p: We offer students the ability to participate in a wide variety of sports, from football, to basketball, to cheer!

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_4 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left

div.p: Proper nutrition has a huge impact in the classroom. That’s why we provide free breakfast, lunch, and dinner to all students!

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_5 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left

div.p: Our staff is dedicated to helping families secure the resources they need, including help with utilities, housing, and transporation.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_6 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left

div.p: Our high school students have many opportunities to explore various colleges and universities, both here at DCS, and at the college.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_7 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left

div.p: Art and music are always a priority at DCS. We offer art and music programs district-wide.

At DCS, we believe that Education is Power: Success begins with a high-quality education. Therefore, we are committed to providing all students with the tools and skills necessary to thrive no matter where life takes them.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_8 et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_blurb_position_top

div.p: All students, K-12, can attend Detroit Community Schools completely free of charge. We also offer a number of free programs, including free meals (breakfast, lunch, & dinner), free transportation, and free aftercare.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_9 et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_blurb_position_top

div.p: Preparing our students for life after K-12 school is our number one priority! From rigorous curriculum, to SAT prep, to extracurricular activities, we go the extra mile to ensure each student is ready for the world after graduation.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_10 et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_blurb_position_top

div.p: We pride ourselves on providing a clean, safe environment for our students and staff. Our campus is professionally cleaned daily, and we have 24/7 security on site.
The latest announcements for all Detroit Community Schools.
